sentence: Representative Liz Cheney, Republican of Wyoming and the vice chairwoman of the committee, has suggested that Mr. Trump could have violated through action or inaction? a previously obscure obstruction charge that federal prosecutors have been using to pursue rioters at the Capitol on Jan. 6: the disruption of Congress's duty to certify the final stage of a presidential election.
title: The Jan. 6 Committee's Consideration of a Criminal Referral, Explained
